sentences.sContent: ...Winners of local contests will participate in the national math competition for free...
...students around the country participate in the program’s competition series...
...Tenants also want to participate in shaping the public areas of the buildings...
...many American students would still have opportunities to participate in organized athletics elsewhere...
...researchers find that disadvantaged children participate in these programs at significantly lower rates...
...who say that students are less likely to participate in class if they are multi-tasking...
...Why did the author participate in the Wharton School management program...
...5 million kids participate in organized programs...

words.tran: 由多人一起参加的；（股票等）持有人有权分享利益的
供人分享的；吸引参与的

trans.tranOther: to take part in an activity or event
